org.drip.analytics.daycount

Class Holiday

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.daycount.Holiday
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedHoliday, FloatingHoliday, StaticHoliday

    public abstract class Holiday
extends Serializer
    This class is an abstraction around holiday and description. Abstract function generates an optional adjustment for weekends in a given year.

        Parameters:

        bBalkOnYearShift - Throw an exception if the year change happens
        wkend - Object representing the weekend days
